Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: However , genotype - phenotype analysis inthe group of CD families revealed two possible associations worthy of follow - up in independent analyses .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| CD families |

In the given paragraph, the term "CD families" is the only disease-related entity. It is mentioned as a group for genotype-phenotype analysis.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| CD |

The term "CD families" refers to families with CD (Crohn's disease), a type of inflammatory bowel disease. Therefore, the valid disease entity in the paragraph is "CD".
